name: 4 Season Hobbit Hole
description: These quick and easy Hobbit Holes are knit from the bottom up in the round on dpns. They are cup shaped. The grass is made by stuffing your Hobbit Hole with pom-poms and sewing them to the sides and back.The door and windows are added with embroidery. To change your house to match a season simply choose a different grass color.To make a winter house stuff with fleece or stuffing. One test knitter said “It is easier than it looks”, which I think is the best kind of project!
suggested_yarn: Patons North America Classic Wool Worsted
full_text: These quick and easy Hobbit Holes are knit from the bottom up in the round on dpns. They are cup shaped. The grass is made by stuffing your Hobbit Hole with pom-poms and sewing them to the sides and back.The door and windows are added with embroidery. To change your house to match a season simply choose a different grass color.To make a winter house stuff with fleece or stuffing. One test knitter said “It is easier than it looks”, which I think is the best kind of project! I hope you enjoy this free pattern! Happy Knitting! Natasha Praise for 4 Seasons Hobbit Hole “Just a perfect pattern. So clear anyone could make one!” (5kittens) This tiny hobbit hole is so cute. I had to make it. Also it is easier than it looks like. (Saphiera) Fun little project and the instructions made it easy too! (MinniStitcher) Oh my goodness, this is so much fun to make! Try it!!! (Margarita)
